# Special Elements

## Line Breaks

Line with two spaces at the end
should create a line break.

Line with backslash\
should also create a line break.

## Escaping

Escape \*asterisks\* to prevent emphasis.

Escape \[brackets\] and \(parentheses\).

Escape \`backticks\` in text.

## Special Characters

Em dash --- like this.

En dash -- like this.

Ellipsis... in text.

"Smart quotes" and 'single quotes'.
